overview: THREE SLAVE WOMEN is comprised of three stories of three women, who share the same slave master. Starring the sexy up-and-coming starlet ASAMI, this film includes some of the best shibari, kinbaku and slave-master scenes ever produced in Japan. All three are in love with Kajiwara, a dominant bondage master who punishes them in intricate and graphic ways. Their separate stories cross paths at a surprising culmination of eroticism, lust and S&M play.
title: Three Slave Women
